title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: June 26, 2023, 03:43:46 AMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 05:47:05 AM by julerz12
content: [EDIT]6/27/2023 RADA team agrees to have an official escrow to this bounty campaign's bounty pool. The details and token transfers are still being finalized. This thread will be updated once the escrow is final.[EDIT]7/9/2023 RADA Team agreed to have an official escrow but the bounty pool will be held by their marketing team (TokenMinds). Both USDT+RADA bounty pool will be in their care.[EDIT]7/24/2023 RADA's bounty campaign has officially ended. The spreadsheet will be finalized and all stakes will be tallied by the bounty campaign manager. The Final List will be sent to the RADA team after a 1 or 2 weeks and they will facilitate the bounty rewards distribution themselves.[EDIT]9/4/2023 The final list has been completed and was already forwarded to the RADA team. It is up to the RADA team when to distribute the bounty rewards.[EDIT]9/11/2023 RADA Bounty rewards has been sent:$3,000 USDT: https://bscscan.com/tx/0xb98e7394b02b29bfb8b88ffa7ba620a4bedf94bb63ab47da1908baa9936ec50f$2,000 worth of RADA: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x35a99d224ed27320d227b44307f7d8d009052434358aa6421839ffd53d83832bNote: The previous calculations were based on a total of $5,000 bounty pool. I had to recalculate the rewards for each participant for both USDT and RADA hence the two separate transactions. $2,000 USDT and 150,000 RADA were sent by the RADA team for the bounty pool.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x08342a3392aa0346fe0ca64656274c4a298464f0e3db655621a2d7cb50a5170bhttps://etherscan.io/tx/0xb1cb7f0ee435a2dbe52c6ae0990258a3d598f713b27bf208e64bddbd70e9a2dbDisclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign), invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO), or use their platform at your own risk.
